project_name.justification: The text states the agreement is for the 'historic Sawyer Gold Mine Property ("Sawyer" or the "Property")'.

company_name.justification: The text clearly identifies the acquiring company: 'Pancontinental Resources Corporation (TSXV: PUC) (OTCQB: PUCCF) ("Pancon" or the "Company") has entered into an exploration lease and purchase option agreement...'. This contradicts the authoritative metadata of 'Carolina Rush Corporation'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer, Pancontinental Resources Corporation, is not mentioned in the provided text.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement provides an option to acquire 100% of the property, as stated: 'Pancon has the exclusive option to purchase the Property (in order to develop new mining operations) at anytime during the Agreement...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is repeatedly referred to as a gold mine, for example: 'Pancon Acquires Historic Sawyer Gold Mine, North Carolina' and 'The Sawyer Mine property has an Historic gold resource estimate (2021) which contains 3.9 million tonnes at 1.1 g/t Au for 134,600 ounces of gold...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'Pancon Acquires Historic Sawyer Gold Mine, North Carolina' and details the transaction for the Sawyer project, which is the primary project of interest.

currency.justification: The currency is specified in the agreement terms for future payments: 'Advanced Royalty Payments of US$25,000 per year...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The agreement does not include any upfront cash payments. The text specifies: 'No cash payments for years one to five (1-5) of the Initial Term'.

share_payments_raw.justification: There is no mention of any share payments as part of the agreement terms.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: There is no mention of a combined cash and share payment.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: There is no mention of any shares being issued as part of the agreement.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: There is no mention of any share warrant payments in the agreement.

option_payments_raw.justification: There is no mention of any option payments in the agreement.

issued_share_price.justification: There is no mention of shares being issued, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The agreement details do not specify any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The agreement details do not specify any monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller retains a 2% NSR as part of the transaction terms: 'Pancon grants a 2% net smelter royalty ("NSR"), subject to the ability of Pancon to purchase 1% of the NSR for a purchase price of US$5,000,000.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the size of the property: 'The 54.6 hectare (135 acre) property is located 5.0 km southwest along trend from the Company's recently announced New Sawyer mine acquisition...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified in the text: 'The 54.6 hectare (135 acre) property...'

resource_size.value: 3.9 million tonnes at a grade of 1.1 g/t Au containing 134,600 ounces of gold, based on a cut off grade of 0.4 g/t Au
resource_size.justification: The text provides a historic resource estimate: 'The resource evaluation estimates a mineral resource of 3.9 million tonnes at a grade of 1.1 g/t Au containing 134,600 ounces of gold, based on a cut off grade of 0.4 g/t Au.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text explicitly states the buyer's ticker and exchange: 'Pancontinental Resources Corporation (TSXV: PUC) (OTCQB: PUCCF)'. This contradicts the authoritative metadata ticker of 'RUSH'.
